prompts.prompt: Generate an official Stranger Things season poster in the exact style of Netflix’s promotional key art, using the person in the reference photo as the central protagonist. Strictly respect every visual detail from the reference: face, hair, expression, lighting, clothing, and pose must be identical. Place the other main characters (Eleven, Mike, Dustin, Lucas, Max, etc.) in the background in their classic poster poses. Include the iconic red Stranger Things logo typography, fog, Christmas lights, grandfather clock, Upside Down gate, and full retro 80s aesthetic exactly like the real posters.

Turn the person in the reference photo into Chief Jim Hopper straight out of the Russian prison in Season 4, preserving 100% of their real facial features, beard length and style from the reference, eye intensity, scars, exact age and brutal expression. Show him shirtless with the massive flamethrower, body covered in sweat, blood, and ash, shaved head, dragon tattoo glowing under fire light. Background: burning Russian gulag, Demogorgon roaring in chains, snow mixed with fire. Lighting: intense orange fire light + cold blue snow reflections. Use gritty 35mm film look, smoke, embers, lens dirt, and maximum “I’m back from the dead” badass energy. Use the face from the uploaded reference image and preserve the same facial features – do not alter the face.

Produce a dark, atmospheric scene inside the Creel House from Season 4. The person in the reference photo is now standing in the attic with Vecna’s grandfather clock behind them. Preserve every single facial detail, hair, eye direction, and expression from the reference image with zero deviation. Light them dramatically with a single hanging bulb swinging slowly, casting deep shadows and warm orange highlights exactly like the show’s cinematography. Dress them in 1950s-meets-1980s clothing with subtle blood stains and dust. In the background, show the stained-glass rose window glowing red, spiderwebs, floating vinyl records, and Vecna’s tentacles creeping along the walls. Add the signature red-black Upside Down particles in the air. Use Arri Alexa-style digital look mixed with 1980s lens diffusion, strong chiaroscuro lighting, and the eerie silence vibe of the Creel House scenes.

Transform the person in the reference photo into a canonical Stranger Things character while keeping 100% of their real facial features, skin tone, eye shape, hair, expression, and exact age from the photo. Use the official visual style of the show (1980s photography, saturated colors, neon lighting, film grain). Dress them in iconic clothing from Season 4, place them in a typical Hawkins or Upside Down background, and add small authentic details like a nosebleed or telekinetic energy if it fits.

A surreal and cinematic portrait of a young man levitating above the ground, viewed from above. He is wearing a turquoise hoodie with a yellow zippег and large headphones. His eyes are glowing white, turned backward, giving him a supernatural appearance. People аге below him, out of focus, emphasizing his floating pose. Dramatic lighting, shallow depth of realistic textures, hyper-detail, dark atmosphere.

The scene shows me, standing in the middle of a deserted, cracked asphalt road. He has his back to the horizon, but turns his face over his left shoulder to face the viewer with a serious expression. He is wearing a dark jacket, jeans, and boots, carrying a backpack. lean, strong body. To his right, embedded in the edge of the road, is a green road sign that reads “Welcome to Hawkins” in white letters. The background is dominated by an apocalyptic and supernatural atmosphere. The sky is tinged with an intense blood red and black, covered by voluminous, dark storm clouds. In the middle of these clouds, rises the colossal and shadowy silhouette of a creature with multiple long tentacles (similar to a giant spider), which seem to touch the ground in the distance. Branching red lightning bolts cut across the sky around the creature, and the crimson light reflects intensely on the surface of the road and on the silhouette of the young man.

Generate an ultra-realistic group shot in the Wheeler family basement exactly as seen in Seasons 1-4. The person from the reference photo must be integrated into the core friend group (Mike, Dustin, Lucas, Will, Eleven, Max) while keeping 100% of their real facial features, age, hairstyle, and expression unchanged they replace no one, they are an additional member sitting on the D&D table. Everyone must be wearing their exact iconic outfits from the specific season you prefer (specify Season 1-4). Recreate the basement perfectly: wood paneling, Christmas lights strung everywhere (some flickering), the D&D board with miniatures, old couch, arcade machine in the corner, and stacks of board games. Lighting is warm tungsten bulbs mixed with the multicolored Christmas lights glow. Use practical lighting feel, 35mm film grain, slight lens distortion, and the cozy yet slightly creepy vibe of the early seasons.

A cinematic and conceptual photograph of a school hallway split vertically down the middle. In the center, a young man a no tshirt only slim fit ribbed vest walks towards the camera, his body split between two worlds. The left side is a normal school hallway, bathed in warm golden light, with polished floors reflecting the light and other blurred students in the background. The right side is a corrupted, dark version of the same hallway, consumed by the “Upside Down,” covered in twisted black vines, thick roots, and filled with a dark blue atmosphere with glowing red spores floating in the air. Dramatic contrast of warm and cool lighting. High definition, detailed textures.

Create a cinematic and dramatic scene on an abandoned city street at night, with a dark and apocalyptic atmosphere. A man is standing in the center of the street, wearing a black hoodie, dark jeans, and black sneakers. He maintains a serious expression, illuminated by an intense red light that reflects off the wet asphalt. The surrounding environment is taken over by black, vine-like tentacles, scattered across the ground and climbing up the building facades. The street is empty, the buildings are tall and dark, and the streetlights emit a faint reddish glow. Above him, the stormy sky is torn by a huge red lightning bolt, creating a supernatural sensation. Small particles float in the air, intensifying the dramatic climate. Hyper-detailed scene, realistic lighting, high contrast, dark red highlights, apocalyptic and supernatural atmosphere. Use the face from the uploaded reference image and preserve the same facial features – do not alter the face.
